rules.active: You can use an additional ranged attack.

details.flavour: Rebel assault rifles are equipped with manual and fully automatic firing modes.

rules.active: You can use two additional ranged attacks. Return a Card with Blue Rarity to your hand.

details.flavour: Rebel soldiers employ distraction devices to buy time to reload.

rules.active: You can use four additional ranged attacks. Return a Card with Green Rarity to your hand.

details.flavour: Rebel armies spare no expense when supplying their troops with ammunition.

details.rules: Whenever you use a Card for the rest of the session, you may return a Card with lesser rarity to your hand.
details.flavour: Rebel squadrons are often mistaken for entire battalions due to the sheer amount of firepower.
